trans-unit.source: Both of these protections can be bypassed with the -force flag if you're confident you're making the right decision. Even if using the -force flag, we recommend making a backup of the state with terraform state pull prior to forcing the overwrite.
trans-unit.target: 如果您确信自己做出了正确的决定，则可以使用 -force 标志来绕过这两种保护。即使使用 -force 标志，我们也建议在强制覆盖之前使用 terraform state pull 备份状态。

trans-unit.source: Both of these safety checks can be disabled with the -force flag. This is not recommended. If you disable the safety checks and are pushing state, the destination state will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 -force 标志禁用这两个安全检查。不建议这样做。如果禁用安全检查并处于推送状态，则目标状态将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Both providers and resources require a schema to be specified. The schema is used to define the structure of the configuration, the types, etc. It is very important to get correct.
trans-unit.target: 提供者和资源都需要指定一个模式。模式是用来定义配置的结构、类型等。掌握正确的模式是非常重要的。

trans-unit.source: Both the -var and -overwrite flag are required. The -var flag sets the value locally (the exact same process as commands such as apply or plan), and the -overwrite flag tells the push command to update Terraform Enterprise.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 -var 和 -overwrite 标志是必需的。所述 -var 标志设置在本地的值（精确相同的过程，如施加或计划命令），并且 -overwrite 标志告诉推命令更新Terraform企业。

trans-unit.source: Building on the above example, the below configuration creates a VM by cloning it from a template, fetched via the vsphere_virtual_machine data source. This allows us to locate the UUID of the template we want to clone, along with settings for network interface type, SCSI bus type (especially important on Windows machines), and disk attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在上述示例的基础上，以下配置通过从模板克隆虚拟机来创建虚拟机，该模板是通过 vsphere_virtual_machine 数据源获取的。这使我们能够找到要克隆的模板的UUID，以及网络接口类型，SCSI总线类型（在Windows计算机上尤其重要）和磁盘属性的设置。

trans-unit.source: Building the graph is done in a series of sequential steps:
trans-unit.target: 构建图形是通过一系列的顺序步骤来完成的。

trans-unit.source: By default Terraform creates Spot Instance Requests with a persistent type, which means that for the duration of their lifetime, AWS will launch an instance with the configured details if and when the spot market will accept the requested price.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Terraform用 persistent 类型创建竞价型实例请求，这意味着在现货市场接受和请求价位的情况下，AWS将在其生命周期内启动一个具有配置详细信息的实例。

trans-unit.source: By default any two AWS services have no access to one another, until access is explicitly granted. For Lambda functions, access is granted using the aws_lambda_permission resource, which should be added to the lambda.tf file created in an earlier step:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在明确授予访问权限之前，任何两个AWS服务都无法相互访问。对于Lambda函数，使用 aws_lambda_permission 资源授予访问权限，该资源应添加到先前步骤中创建的 lambda.tf 文件中：

trans-unit.source: By default the command will not check for available updates to already-installed modules, but you can use the -upgrade option to check for available upgrades. When version constraints are specified (as described in the following section) a newer version will be used only if it is within the given constraint.
trans-unit.target: 缺省情况下，该命令不会检查已安装模块的可用更新，但是您可以使用 -upgrade 选项来检查可用的升级。当指定了版本约束时（如下节所述），只有在给定约束范围内时，才会使用较新的版本。

trans-unit.source: By default this data is written into a .terraform subdirectory of the current directory, but the path given in TF_DATA_DIR will be used instead if non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此数据被写入当前目录的 .terraform 子目录中，但是如果非空，则将使用 TF_DATA_DIR 中给定的路径。

trans-unit.source: By default, apply scans the current directory for the configuration and applies the changes appropriately. However, a path to another configuration or an execution plan can be provided. Explicit execution plans files can be used to split plan and apply into separate steps within automation systems.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， apply 在当前目录中扫描配置，并适当地应用更改。但是，可以提供另一种配置或执行计划的路径。显式执行计划文件可用于拆分计划，并将其应用于自动化系统中的单独步骤。

trans-unit.source: By default, fmt scans the current directory for configuration files. If the dir argument is provided then it will scan that given directory instead. If dir is a single dash (-) then fmt will read from standard input (STDIN).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， fmt 会在当前目录中扫描配置文件。如果提供 dir 参数，则它将扫描该给定目录。如果 dir 是单破折号（ - ），则 fmt 将从标准输入（STDIN）中读取。

trans-unit.source: By default, plan requires no flags and looks in the current directory for the configuration and state file to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， plan 不需要任何标志，并在当前目录中查找要刷新的配置和状态文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, refresh requires no flags and looks in the current directory for the configuration and state file to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， refresh 不需要任何标志，并在当前目录中查找要刷新的配置和状态文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, terraform init assumes that the working directory already contains a configuration and will attempt to initialize that configuration.
trans-unit.target: 缺省情况下， terraform init 假定工作目录已经包含一个配置，并将尝试初始化该配置。

trans-unit.source: By default, terraform init downloads plugins into a subdirectory of the working directory so that each working directory is self-contained. As a consequence, if you have multiple configurations that use the same provider then a separate copy of its plugin will be downloaded for each configuration.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， terraform init 将插件下载到工作目录的子目录中，以便每个工作目录都是独立的。因此，如果您具有使用同一提供程序的多个配置，则将为每种配置下载其插件的单独副本。

trans-unit.source: By default, validate requires no flags and looks in the current directory for the configurations.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， validate 不需要标志，并在当前目录中查找配置。

trans-unit.source: By default, Terraform stores state locally in a file named terraform.tfstate. When working with Terraform in a team, use of a local file makes Terraform usage complicated because each user must make sure they always have the latest state data before running Terraform and make sure that nobody else runs Terraform at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Terraform将状态本地存储在名为 terraform.tfstate 的文件中。在团队中使用Terraform时，使用本地文件会使Terraform的使用变得复杂，因为每个用户都必须在运行Terraform之前确保始终拥有最新的状态数据，并确保没有其他人同时运行Terraform。

trans-unit.source: By default, Terraform uses the "local" backend, which is the normal behavior of Terraform you're used to. This is the backend that was being invoked throughout the introduction.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Terraform使用“本地”后端，这是您惯常使用的Terraform的正常行为。这是在整个引言中被调用的后端。

trans-unit.source: By default, a resource targets the provider based on its type. For example an aws_instance resource will target the "aws" provider. As of Terraform 0.5.0, a resource can target any provider by name.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，资源根据提供者的类型来定位提供者。例如， aws_instance 资源将针对“ aws”提供程序。从Terraform 0.5.0开始，资源可以按名称定位到任何提供程序。

trans-unit.source: By default, commands such as the plan command and graph command will show each resource in a nested module to represent the full scope of the configuration. For more complex configurations, the -module-depth option may be useful to summarize some or all of the modules as single objects.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，诸如plan命令和graph命令之类的命令将在嵌套模块中显示每个资源，以代表配置的整个范围。对于更复杂的配置， -module-depth 选项可能有助于将某些或所有模块汇总为单个对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, only verified modules are shown in search results. Verified modules are reviewed by HashiCorp to ensure stability and compatibility. By using the filters, you can view unverified modules as well.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，搜索结果中仅显示经过验证的模块。HashiCorp审核经过验证的模块，以确保稳定性和兼容性。通过使用过滤器，您还可以查看未验证的模块。

trans-unit.source: By default, provisioners that fail will also cause the Terraform apply itself to error. The on_failure setting can be used to change this. The allowed values are:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，失败的预配器也将导致Terraform将自身应用于错误。该 on_failure 设置可用于更改此。允许的值为：

trans-unit.source: By default, read access to a container does not include permission to list the objects in the container. To allow listing of objects as well, include the .rlistings directive in the ACL.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对容器的读取访问权限不包括列出容器中对象的权限。要同时允许列出对象，请在ACL中包括 .rlistings 指令。

trans-unit.source: By default, resources are matched with provider configurations by matching the start of the resource name. For example, a resource of type vsphere_virtual_machine is associated with a provider called vsphere.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，资源通过匹配资源名称的开头与提供程序配置匹配。例如，类型为 vsphere_virtual_machine 的资源与名为 vsphere 的提供程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: By default, this data sources retrieves information based on the AWSCURRENT staging label.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此数据源基于 AWSCURRENT 暂存标签检索信息。

trans-unit.source: By using the network RPC interface, you can build and distribute a plugin for Terraform without having to rebuild Terraform itself. This makes it easy for you to build a Terraform plugin for your organization's internal use, for a proprietary API that you don't want to open source, or to prototype something before contributing it back to the main project.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用网络RPC接口,你可以为Terraform构建和发布一个插件,而无需重建Terraform本身。这使得您可以很容易地构建一个Terraform插件,供您的组织内部使用,或为您不想开放源代码的专有API,或在将其贡献给主项目之前进行原型设计。

trans-unit.source: Changes to a DB instance can occur when you manually change a parameter, such as allocated_storage, and are reflected in the next maintenance window. Because of this, Terraform may report a difference in its planning phase because a modification has not yet taken place. You can use the apply_immediately flag to instruct the service to apply the change immediately (see documentation below).
trans-unit.target: 当您手动更改参数（例如， allocated_storage ，可能会发生对数据库实例的更改，这些更改将反映在下一个维护窗口中。因此，Terraform可能会报告其计划阶段的差异，因为尚未进行修改。您可以使用 apply_immediately 标志来指示服务立即应用更改（请参见下面的文档）。

trans-unit.source: Changes to a RDS Cluster can occur when you manually change a parameter, such as port, and are reflected in the next maintenance window. Because of this, Terraform may report a difference in its planning phase because a modification has not yet taken place. You can use the apply_immediately flag to instruct the service to apply the change immediately (see documentation below).
trans-unit.target: 手动更改参数（例如 port )时，可能会发生对RDS群集的更改，这些更改将反映在下一个维护窗口中。因此，Terraform可能会报告其计划阶段的差异，因为尚未进行修改。您可以使用 apply_immediately 标志来指示服务立即应用更改（请参见下面的文档）。

trans-unit.source: Changes to an MQ Broker can occur when you change a parameter, such as configuration or user, and are reflected in the next maintenance window. Because of this, Terraform may report a difference in its planning phase because a modification has not yet taken place. You can use the apply_immediately flag to instruct the service to apply the change immediately (see documentation below).
trans-unit.target: 当您更改参数（例如 configuration 或 user )时，可能会发生对MQ Broker的更改，这些更改将反映在下一个维护窗口中。因此，Terraform可能会报告其计划阶段的差异，因为尚未进行修改。您可以使用 apply_immediately 标志来指示服务立即应用更改（请参见下面的文档）。

trans-unit.source: Circonus supports a variety of different checks. Each check type has its own set of options that must be configured. Each check type conflicts with every other check type (i.e. a circonus_check configured for a json check will conflict with all other check types, therefore a postgresql check must be a different circonus_check resource).
trans-unit.target: 马戏团支持各种不同的检查。每种检查类型都有自己的一组必须配置的选项。每个检查类型都与其他所有检查类型冲突（即，为 json 检查配置的 circonus_check 将与所有其他检查类型冲突，因此 postgresql 检查必须是不同的 circonus_check 资源）。

trans-unit.source: Community providers are providers where we depend on the community to contribute fixes and enhancements to improve. HashiCorp will run automated tests and ensure these providers continue to work, but will not dedicate full time resources to add new features to these providers. These providers are available in official Terraform releases, but the functionality is primarily contributed.
trans-unit.target: 社区提供商是我们依靠社区贡献修复和增强功能来改进的提供商。HashiCorp会进行自动测试并确保这些提供者继续工作,但不会投入全职资源为这些提供者添加新功能。这些提供商在Terraform的官方版本中可以使用,但功能主要是贡献的。

trans-unit.source: Comparing modules to functions in a traditional programming language, if variables are analogous to function arguments and outputs are analogous to function return values then local values are comparable to a function's local variables.

trans-unit.source: ComposeAggregateTestCheckFunc lets you compose multiple TestCheckFunc functions into a single check. It’s purpose and usage is identical to ComposeTestCheckFunc, however each check is ran in order even if a previous check failed, collecting the errors returned from any checks and returning a single aggregate error. The entire TestCase is still stopped, and Terraform attempts to destroy any resources created.
trans-unit.target: ComposeAggregateTestCheckFunc允许您将多个TestCheckFunc函数组合到一个检查中。它的目的和用法与ComposeTestCheckFunc相同，但是即使先前的检查失败，也会按顺序运行每个检查，收集从任何检查返回的错误并返回单个汇总错误。整个 TestCase 仍处于停止状态，Terraform尝试破坏创建的任何资源。

trans-unit.source: ComposeTestCheckFunc lets you compose multiple TestCheckFunc functions into a single check. As a user testing their provider, this lets you decompose your checks into smaller pieces more easily, with individual methods for checking specific attributes. Each check is ran in the order provided, and on failure the entire TestCase is stopped, and Terraform attempts to destroy any resources created.
trans-unit.target: ComposeTestCheckFunc允许您将多个TestCheckFunc函数组合到一个检查中。当用户测试其提供程序时，这使您可以使用用于检查特定属性的单独方法更轻松地将检查分解为较小的部分。每次检查均按提供的顺序运行，一旦失败，整个 TestCase 都会停止，Terraform会尝试销毁创建的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Considering a scenario where this virtual machine is of high value to the application or organization for which it does its work, it's been determined in the event of a host failure, that this should be one of the first virtual machines to be started by vSphere HA during recovery. Hence, its ha_vm_restart_priority as been set to highest, which, assuming that the default restart priority is medium and no other virtual machine has been assigned the highest priority, will mean that this VM will be started before any other virtual machine in the event of host failure.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到该虚拟机对于为其进行工作的应用程序或组织具有高价值的情况，已确定在主机发生故障的情况下，该虚拟机应是vSphere HA启动的首批虚拟机之一在恢复期间。因此，它的 ha_vm_restart_priority 作为被设置为 highest ，其中，假设默认重新启动优先级为 medium ，并没有其他的虚拟机已经分配了 highest 优先级，将意味着这个VM将任何其他虚拟机之前，在主机的情况下启动失败。
限制条件:至少30分钟的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Creating a virtual machine from scratch

Creating modules in Terraform is easy. You may want to do this to better organize your code, to make a reusable component, or just to learn more about Terraform. For any reason, if you already know the basics of Terraform, then creating a module is a piece of cake.
trans-unit.target: 在Terraform中创建模块很简单。你可能想这样做是为了更好地组织你的代码,制作一个可重复使用的组件,或者只是为了学习更多关于Terraform的知识。无论出于什么原因,如果你已经了解Terraform的基础知识,那么创建一个模块是小菜一碟。

trans-unit.source: Creating this resource grants a particular team permissions on a particular repository.
trans-unit.target: 创建此资源可授予特定团队对特定资源库的权限。

trans-unit.source: Credentials can also be specified using any of the following environment variables (listed in order of precedence):
trans-unit.target: 还可以使用下列环境变量(按先后顺序排列)指定全权证书:

trans-unit.source: Credentials must be provided via the ALICLOUD_ACCESS_KEY, and ALICLOUD_SECRET_KEY environment variables in order to run acceptance tests.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过 ALICLOUD_ACCESS_KEY 和 ALICLOUD_SECRET_KEY 环境变量提供凭据，以便运行验收测试。

trans-unit.source: Credentials must be provided via the OPC_USERNAME, OPC_PASSWORD, OPC_IDENTITY_DOMAIN and OPC_ENDPOINT environment variables in order to run acceptance tests.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过 OPC_USERNAME ， OPC_PASSWORD ， OPC_IDENTITY_DOMAIN 和 OPC_ENDPOINT 环境变量提供凭据才能运行验收测试。

trans-unit.source: Credentials must be provided via the OPC_USERNAME, OPC_PASSWORD, OPC_IDENTITY_DOMAIN and ORACLEPAAS_DATABASE_ENDPOINT, ORACLEPAAS_JAVA_ENDPOINT and ORACLEPAAS_MYSQL_ENDPOINT environment variables in order to run acceptance tests.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过 OPC_USERNAME ， OPC_PASSWORD ， OPC_IDENTITY_DOMAIN 和 ORACLEPAAS_DATABASE_ENDPOINT ， ORACLEPAAS_JAVA_ENDPOINT 和 ORACLEPAAS_MYSQL_ENDPOINT 环境变量来提供凭据，以便运行验收测试。

trans-unit.source: Currently Terraform has no mechanism to redact or protect secrets that are provided via configuration, so teams choosing to use Terraform for populating Vault secrets should pay careful attention to the notes on each resource's documentation page about how any secrets are persisted to the state and consider carefully whether such usage is compatible with their security policies.
trans-unit.target: 目前Terraform没有机制来编辑或保护通过配置提供的秘密,所以选择使用Terraform来填充Vault秘密的团队应该仔细注意每个资源文档页面上关于任何秘密如何持久化到状态的说明,并仔细考虑这样的使用是否与他们的安全策略兼容。

trans-unit.source: Currently Terraform has no mechanism to redact or protect secrets that are returned via data sources, so secrets read via this provider will be persisted into the Terraform state, into any plan files, and in some cases in the console output produced while planning and applying. These artifacts must therefore all be protected accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 目前,Terraform没有机制来编辑或保护通过数据源返回的秘密,因此,通过该提供者读取的秘密将持久地保存在Terraform状态中,保存在任何计划文件中,在某些情况下,保存在计划和应用时产生的控制台输出中。因此,这些工件都必须受到相应的保护。

trans-unit.source: Currently not all of Terraform's subcommands have full tab-completion support for all arguments. We plan to improve tab-completion coverage over time.
trans-unit.target: 目前,并不是所有的Terraform子命令都对所有的参数有完全的tab补全支持。我们计划随着时间的推移提高tab补全的覆盖率。

trans-unit.source: Data instance arguments may refer to computed values, in which case the attributes of the instance itself cannot be resolved until all of its arguments are defined. In this case, refreshing the data instance will be deferred until the "apply" phase, and all interpolations of the data instance attributes will show as "computed" in the plan since the values are not yet known.
trans-unit.target: 数据实例参数可能指的是计算值,在这种情况下,实例本身的属性在其所有参数被定义之前无法解析。在这种情况下,刷新数据实例将被推迟到 "应用 "阶段,所有数据实例属性的插值将在计划中显示为 "计算",因为这些值还不知道。

trans-unit.source: Default values: OldestScalingConfiguration and OldestInstance. You can enter up to two removal policies.

trans-unit.source: Default: A 30-minute window selected at random from an 8-hour block of time per region, occurring on a random day of the week.

trans-unit.source: Despite the state being stored remotely, all Terraform commands such as terraform console, the terraform state operations, terraform taint, and more will continue to work as if the state was local.

trans-unit.source: Destroy provisioners are run before the resource is destroyed. If they fail, Terraform will error and rerun the provisioners again on the next terraform apply. Due to this behavior, care should be taken for destroy provisioners to be safe to run multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 在销毁资源之前运行销毁预配器。如果它们失败，则Terraform将出错，并在下一个 terraform apply 上再次运行预配置程序。由于这种行为，应注意使销毁供应商安全运行多次。

trans-unit.source: Destroy-time provisioners can only run if they remain in the configuration at the time a resource is destroyed. If a resource block with a destroy-time provisioner is removed entirely from the configuration, its provisioner configurations are removed along with it and thus the destroy provisioner won't run. To work around this, a multi-step process can be used to safely remove a resource with a destroy-time provisioner:
trans-unit.target: 销毁时间供应者只有在资源被销毁时仍在配置中才能运行。如果将带有毁灭时间供应器的资源块从配置中完全移除,那么它的供应器配置也会随之移除,因此毁灭时间供应器不会运行。为了解决这个问题,可以使用一个多步骤的过程来安全地删除带有毁灭时间供应者的资源。

trans-unit.source: Disks always get imported with keep_on_remove enabled until the first terraform apply runs, which will remove the setting for known disks. This is an extra safeguard against naming or accounting mistakes in the disk configuration.
trans-unit.target: 磁盘始终在启用 keep_on_remove 的情况下导入，直到运行第一个 terraform apply 为止，这将删除已知磁盘的设置。这是防止磁盘配置中的命名或记帐错误的额外保护措施。

trans-unit.source: Disks are managed by an arbitrary label supplied to the label attribute of a disk sub-resource. This is separate from the automatic naming that vSphere picks for you when creating a virtual machine. Control over a virtual disk's name is not supported unless you are attaching an external disk with the attach attribute.
trans-unit.target: 磁盘由提供给 disk 子资源的 label 属性的任意标签管理。这与vSphere在创建虚拟机时为您选择的自动命名不同。除非您使用 attach 属性附加外部磁盘，否则不支持对虚拟磁盘名称的控制。

trans-unit.source: Disks need to have their label argument assigned in a convention matching diskN, starting with disk number 0, based on each disk's order on the SCSI bus. As an example, a disk on SCSI controller 0 with a unit number of 0 would be labeled disk0, a disk on the same controller with a unit number of 1 would be disk1, but the next disk, which is on SCSI controller 1 with a unit number of 0, still becomes disk2.
trans-unit.target: 磁盘需要根据SCSI总线上每个磁盘的顺序，在与磁盘 diskN 匹配的约定中从磁盘号0开始分配其 label 参数。例如，在SCSI控制器0上单位号为0 的磁盘将被标记为 disk0 ，在同一控制器上的单位号为1的磁盘将被标记为 disk1 ，但是下一个磁盘在SCSI控制器1上的磁盘号为单元号0仍变为 disk2 。

trans-unit.source: Distributed port groups can be used as networks for virtual machines, allowing VMs to use the networking supplied by a distributed virtual switch (DVS), with a set of policies that apply to that individual newtork, if desired.
trans-unit.target: 分布式端口组可以作为虚拟机的网络,允许虚拟机使用分布式虚拟交换机(DVS)提供的网络,如果需要的话,可以使用一套适用于该单个newtork的策略。

trans-unit.source: Due to the assume_role setting in the AWS provider configuration, any management operations for AWS resources will be performed via the configured role in the appropriate environment AWS account. The backend operations, such as reading and writing the state from S3, will be performed directly as the administrator's own user within the administrative account.
trans-unit.target: 由于AWS提供程序配置中的 assume_role 设置，将通过在适当的环境AWS帐户中配置的角色来执行对AWS资源的任何管理操作。后端操作，例如从S3读取和写入状态，将直接作为管理员自己的用户在管理帐户中执行。

trans-unit.source: During init, the configuration is searched for module blocks, and the source code for referenced modules is retrieved from the locations given in their source arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化期间，将在配置中搜索 module 块，并从其 source 参数中指定的位置检索所引用模块的源代码。

trans-unit.source: During init, the configuration is searched for both direct and indirect references to providers, and the plugins for the providers are retrieved from the plugin repository. The downloaded plugins are installed to a subdirectory of the working directory, and are thus local to that working directory.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化期间，将在配置中搜索对提供者的直接和间接引用，并从插件存储库中检索提供者的插件。下载的插件将安装到工作目录的子目录中，因此对于该工作目录而言是本地的。

trans-unit.source: During init, the root configuration directory is consulted for backend configuration and the chosen backend is initialized using the given configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化期间，将查询根配置目录以进行后端配置，并使用给定的配置设置初始化所选的后端。

trans-unit.source: Each AWS Instance type has a different set of Instance Store block devices available for attachment. AWS publishes a list of which ephemeral devices are available on each type. The devices are always identified by the virtual_name in the format "ephemeral{0..N}".
trans-unit.target: 每种AWS实例类型都有一组不同的实例存储块设备可用于附件。AWS会发布每种类型可用的临时设备的列表。设备始终由 virtual_name 标识，格式为 "ephemeral{0..N}" 。

trans-unit.source: Each AWS Instance type has a different set of Instance Store block devices available for attachment. AWS publishes a list of which ephemeral devices are available on each type. The devices are always identified by the virtual_name in the format "ephemeral{0..N}".
trans-unit.target: 每种AWS实例类型都有一组不同的实例存储块设备可用于附件。AWS会发布每种类型可用的临时设备的列表。设备始终由 virtual_name 标识，格式为 "ephemeral{0..N}" 。

trans-unit.source: Each AWS VPC (or region, if using EC2 Classic) comes with a Default Security Group that cannot be deleted. The aws_default_security_group allows you to manage this Security Group, but Terraform cannot destroy it. Removing this resource from your configuration will remove it from your statefile and management, but will not destroy the Security Group. All ingress or egress rules will be left as they are at the time of removal. You can resume managing them via the AWS Console.
trans-unit.target: 每个AWS VPC（或区域，如果使用的是EC2 Classic）都带有一个无法删除的默认安全组。该 aws_default_security_group 允许你管理这个安全组，但Terraform不能破坏它。从配置中删除此资源会将其从状态文件和管理中删除，但不会破坏安全组。所有入口或出口规则将在删除时保持不变。您可以通过AWS控制台继续管理它们。

trans-unit.source: Each AWS VPC comes with a Default Network ACL that cannot be deleted. The aws_default_network_acl allows you to manage this Network ACL, but Terraform cannot destroy it. Removing this resource from your configuration will remove it from your statefile and management, but will not destroy the Network ACL. All Subnets associations and ingress or egress rules will be left as they are at the time of removal. You can resume managing them via the AWS Console.
trans-unit.target: 每个AWS VPC都带有一个无法删除的默认网络ACL。该 aws_default_network_acl 允许你管理这个网络ACL，但Terraform不能破坏它。从配置中删除此资源会将其从状态文件和管理中删除，但不会破坏网络ACL。删除时，所有子网关联以及入口或出口规则将保持不变。您可以通过AWS控制台继续管理它们。

trans-unit.source: Each AWS region comes with a default set of DHCP options. This is an advanced resource, and has special caveats to be aware of when using it. Please read this document in its entirety before using this resource.
trans-unit.target: 每个AWS区域都带有一组默认的DHCP选项。这是一种高级资源，使用时有一些特别注意事项。在使用本资源之前，请完整阅读本文档。

trans-unit.source: Each Administrator will run Terraform using credentials for their IAM user in the administrative account. IAM Role Delegation is used to grant these users access to the roles created in each environment account.
trans-unit.target: 每个管理员将使用管理帐户中其IAM用户的凭据来运行Terraform。IAM角色委派用于授予这些用户访问在每个环境帐户中创建的角色的权限。

trans-unit.source: Each GCP project contains one or more VPC networks. Each VPC network is a global entity spanning all GCP regions. This global VPC network allows VM instances and other resources to communicate with each other via internal, private IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 每个GCP项目都包含一个或多个VPC网络。每个VPC网络是一个跨越所有GCP区域的全局实体。这个全局VPC网络允许虚拟机实例和其他资源通过内部私有IP地址相互通信。

trans-unit.source: Each Lambda function must have an associated IAM role which dictates what access it has to other AWS services. The above configuration specifies a role with no access policy, effectively giving the function no access to any AWS services, since our example application requires no such access.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Lambda 函数必须有一个相关联的 IAM 角色,该角色决定了它对其他 AWS 服务的访问权限。上面的配置指定了一个没有访问策略的角色,有效地使该函数无法访问任何AWS服务,因为我们的示例应用程序不需要这样的访问。

trans-unit.source: Each Storage Attachment config manages a single storage attachment that is created during instance creation. This means that any storage attachments created during instance creation cannot be detached from the instance. Use the resource_storage_attachment resource to manage storage attachments for instances if you wish to detach the storage volumes at a later date.
trans-unit.target: 每个存储附件配置管理一个在实例创建期间创建的单个存储附件。这意味着无法在实例创建期间创建的任何存储附件都与实例分离。如果您希望以后分离存储卷，请使用 resource_storage_attachment 资源管理实例的存储附件。

trans-unit.source: Each Terraform configuration has an associated backend that defines how operations are executed and where persistent data such as the Terraform state are stored.
trans-unit.target: 每个Terraform配置都有一个关联的后端，该后端定义了如何执行操作以及在何处存储持久数据（例如Terraform状态）。

trans-unit.source: Each VPC created in AWS comes with a Default Network ACL that can be managed, but not destroyed. This is an advanced resource, and has special caveats to be aware of when using it. Please read this document in its entirety before using this resource.
trans-unit.target: 在AWS中创建的每个VPC都带有一个默认网络ACL，该ACL可以管理但不能销毁。这是一种高级资源，使用时有一些特别注意事项。在使用本资源之前，请完整阅读本文档。

trans-unit.source: Each VPC created in AWS comes with a Default Route Table that can be managed, but not destroyed. This is an advanced resource, and has special caveats to be aware of when using it. Please read this document in its entirety before using this resource. It is recommended you do not use both aws_default_route_table to manage the default route table and use the aws_main_route_table_association, due to possible conflict in routes.
trans-unit.target: 在AWS中创建的每个VPC都带有一个默认路由表，该表可以被管理，但不能被销毁。这是一种高级资源，使用时有一些特别注意事项。在使用本资源之前，请完整阅读本文档。建议您不要使用这两种 aws_default_route_table 管理默认的路由表，并使用 aws_main_route_table_association ，由于航线可能发生的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Each VPC network is subdivided into subnets, and each subnet is contained within a single region. You can have more than one subnet in a region for a given VPC network. Each subnet has a contiguous private RFC1918 IP space. You create instances, containers, and the like in these subnets. When you create an instance, you must create it in a subnet, and the instance draws its internal IP address from that subnet.
trans-unit.target: 每个VPC网络被细分为子网,每个子网包含在一个区域内。对于一个给定的VPC网络,一个区域内可以有多个子网。每个子网都有一个连续的私有RFC1918 IP空间。您可以在这些子网中创建实例、容器等。当您创建一个实例时,您必须在子网中创建它,并且该实例从该子网中提取其内部 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: Each of the *_block_device attributes controls a portion of the AWS Instance's "Block Device Mapping". It's a good idea to familiarize yourself with AWS's Block Device Mapping docs to understand the implications of using these attributes.

trans-unit.source: Each of the *_block_device attributes controls a portion of the AWS Instance's "Block Device Mapping". It's a good idea to familiarize yourself with AWS's Block Device Mapping docs to understand the implications of using these attributes.
trans-unit.target: *_block_device 属性中的每个属性都控制AWS实例的“块设备映射”的一部分。熟悉AWS的块设备映射文档以了解使用这些属性的含义是一个好主意。

trans-unit.source: Each of the *_block_device attributes controls a portion of the AWS Launch Configuration's "Block Device Mapping". It's a good idea to familiarize yourself with AWS's Block Device Mapping docs to understand the implications of using these attributes.
trans-unit.target: 每个 *_block_device 属性都控制AWS启动配置的“块设备映射”的一部分。熟悉AWS的块设备映射文档以了解使用这些属性的含义是一个好主意。

trans-unit.source: Each of the network_interface attributes controls a portion of the AWS Instance's "Elastic Network Interfaces". It's a good idea to familiarize yourself with AWS's Elastic Network Interfaces docs to understand the implications of using these attributes.
trans-unit.target: 每个 network_interface 属性都控制AWS实例的“弹性网络接口”的一部分。熟悉AWS的Elastic Network Interfaces文档以了解使用这些属性的含义是一个好主意。

trans-unit.source: Each of the network_interface blocks attach a network interface to an EC2 Instance during boot time. However, because the network interface is attached at boot-time, replacing/modifying the network interface WILL trigger a recreation of the EC2 Instance. If you should need at any point to detach/modify/re-attach a network interface to the instance, use the aws_network_interface or aws_network_interface_attachment resources instead.
trans-unit.target: 引导期间，每个 network_interface 块都将网络接口连接到EC2实例。但是，由于网络接口是在引导时连接的，因此替换/修改网络接口将触发EC2实例的重新创建。如果您在任何时候都需要将网络接口分离/修改/重新连接到实例，请改用 aws_network_interface 或 aws_network_interface_attachment 资源。

trans-unit.source: Each of the four struct fields point to a function. While it is technically possible to inline all functions in the resource schema, best practice dictates pulling each function into its own method. This optimizes for both testing and readability. Fill in those stubs now, paying close attention to method signatures.
trans-unit.target: 四个结构域中的每一个都指向一个函数。虽然从技术上讲,可以在资源模式中内联所有的函数,但最好的做法是将每个函数拉到它自己的方法中。这对测试和可读性都有优化作用。现在填写这些存根,密切关注方法签名。

trans-unit.source: Each resource in Terraform must implement some basic logic to become importable. As a result, not all Terraform resources are currently importable. For those resources that support import, they are documented at the bottom of each resource documentation page, under the Import heading. If you find a resource that you want to import and Terraform reports that it is not importable, please report an issue in the relevant provider repository.
trans-unit.target: Terraform中的每个资源都必须实现一些基本的逻辑才能被导入。因此,目前并非所有的Terraform资源都可以导入。对于那些支持导入的资源,在每个资源文档页面的底部的导入标题下都有说明。如果你发现你想导入的资源,而Terraform报告说它不能导入,请在相关的提供者资源库中报告一个问题。

trans-unit.source: Each resource in the configuration must be associated with one provider configuration, which may either be within the same module as the resource or be passed from the parent module. Providers can be passed down to descendent modules in two ways: either implicitly through inheritance, or explicitly via the providers argument within a module block. These two options are discussed in more detail in the following sections.
trans-unit.target: 配置中的每个资源必须与一个提供程序配置相关联，该提供程序配置可以与资源位于同一模块中，也可以从父模块传递。可以通过两种方式将提供程序向下传递给后代模块：通过继承隐式传递，或通过 module 块内的 providers 参数显式传递。以下各节将更详细地讨论这两个选项。

trans-unit.source: Each resource should then have its own provider attribute set to either "aws.src" or "aws.dst" to choose which of the two provider instances to use.
trans-unit.target: 然后，每个资源应将其自己的 provider 属性设置为 "aws.src" 或 "aws.dst" 以选择使用两个提供程序实例中的哪个。

trans-unit.source: Each returned module has an array of available versions, which Terraform matches against any version constraints given in configuration.
trans-unit.target: 每个返回的模块都有一个可用的版本数组,Terraform会根据配置中给定的版本限制进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: Each role's Assume Role Policy must grant access to the administrative AWS account, which creates a trust relationship with the administrative AWS account so that its users may assume the role.
trans-unit.target: 每个角色的“ 承担角色策略”都必须授予对管理AWS账户的访问权限，这将与管理AWS账户建立信任关系，以便其用户可以担任该角色。

trans-unit.source: Each time a new provider is added to configuration -- either explicitly via a provider block or by adding a resource from that provider -- it's necessary to initialize that provider before use. Initialization downloads and installs the provider's plugin and prepares it to be used.
trans-unit.target: 每次将新的提供程序添加到配置中时（通过 provider 块显式添加或通过从该提供程序添加资源）都需要在使用前初始化该提供程序。初始化将下载并安装提供程序的插件，并准备使用它。

trans-unit.source: Each virtual machine instance has an ephemeral internal IP address and, optionally, an external IP address. To communicate between instances on the same network, you can use an instance's internal IP address. To communicate with the Internet and instances outside of the same network, you must specify the instance's external IP address.
trans-unit.target: 每个虚拟机实例都有一个短暂的内部 IP 地址,也可选择使用外部 IP 地址。要在同一网络上的实例之间进行通信,您可以使用实例的内部 IP 地址。要与互联网和同一网络之外的实例进行通信,您必须指定实例的外部 IP 地址。
无论是 account_aggregation_source 或 organization_aggregation_source 必须指定。

trans-unit.source: Every data source in Terraform is mapped to a provider based on longest-prefix matching. For example the aws_ami data source would map to the aws provider (if that exists).
trans-unit.target: 基于最长前缀匹配，将Terraform中的每个数据源映射到提供程序。例如， aws_ami 数据源将映射到 aws 提供程序（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: Every page on the registry has a search field for finding modules. Enter any type of module you're looking for (examples: "vault", "vpc", "database") and resulting modules will be listed. The search query will look at module name, provider, and description to match your search terms. On the results page, filters can be used further refine search results.
trans-unit.target: 注册表的每个页面都有一个搜索栏,用于查找模块。输入您正在寻找的任何类型的模块(例如:"vault"、"vpc"、"数据库"),结果模块将被列出。搜索查询将查看模块名称、供应商和描述,以匹配您的搜索条件。在结果页面上,可以使用过滤器进一步细化搜索结果。

trans-unit.source: Exactly one of availability_zones or subnets must be specified: this determines if the ELB exists in a VPC or in EC2-classic.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定 availability_zones 或 subnets 一个：这确定ELB是否存在于VPC或经典的EC2中。

trans-unit.source: Exactly one of records or alias must be specified: this determines whether it's an alias record.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定 records 或 alias 之一：这确定它是否为别名记录。

trans-unit.source: Exactly one of the nested blocks of configuration options must be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 必须提供确切的一个嵌套的配置选项块。

trans-unit.source: Example (values are separated by a ,): $ terraform import random_integer.priority 15390,1,99999
trans-unit.target: 实施例（数值由分开 , ）： $ terraform import random_integer.priority 15390,1,99999
